title: cmd/gc: stack overflow with some spell error with interface recursion
body:
by **bronze1man**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
http://play.golang.org/p/t8wgBlfCr6

I am trying to do some stuff to simulate old inherit stuff in c++.I come across a stack
overflow with a spell error in my method name

2. What is the full compiler output?
runtime: goroutine stack exceeds 250000000-byte limit
fatal error: stack overflow

runtime stack:
runtime.throw(0x1b4980, 0x203c0)
	/tmp/sandbox/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:471 +0xa0
runtime.newstack()
	/tmp/sandbox/go/src/pkg/runtime/stack.c:295 +0x440
runtime.morestack()
	/tmp/sandbox/go/src/pkg/runtime/asm_amd64p32.s:207 +0x80

goroutine 1 [stack split]:
